trans-unit.target: 形式为""的序列。

trans-unit.source: A sequence of zero or more string names.
trans-unit.target: 零个或多个字符串名称的序列。

trans-unit.source: A sequencer's loop end point defaults to -1, meaning the end of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 音序器的循环终点默认为-1,即序列的结束。

trans-unit.source: A sequencer's loop start point defaults to start of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 定序器的循环起始点默认为序列的开始。

trans-unit.source: A sequential implementation of a reduction using a collector would create a single result container using the supplier function, and invoke the accumulator function once for each input element. A parallel implementation would partition the input, create a result container for each partition, accumulate the contents of each partition into a subresult for that partition, and then use the combiner function to merge the subresults into a combined result.
trans-unit.target: 使用收集器的还原的顺序实现将使用供应商函数创建一个单一的结果容器,并为每个输入元素调用一次累加器函数。并行实现将对输入进行分区,为每个分区创建一个结果容器,将每个分区的内容累加到该分区的子结果中,然后使用组合函数将子结果合并成一个组合结果。

trans-unit.source: A serializable mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL JAVA_OBJECT value. Assuming the Java object implements the Serializable interface, this class simply wraps the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: SQL JAVA_OBJECT 值的Java编程语言中的可序列化映射。假设Java对象实现了 Serializable 接口，则此类仅包装序列化过程。

trans-unit.target: 在Java编程语言中,一个SQL ARRAY值的可序列化映射。

trans-unit.target: 在Java编程语言中,一个SQL CLOB值的可序列化映射。

trans-unit.source: A serializable mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL DATALINK value. A DATALINK value references a file outside of the underlying data source that the originating data source manages.
trans-unit.target: SQL DATALINK值在Java编程语言中的可序列化映射。DATALINK值引用了底层数据源之外的文件,该文件由原数据源管理。

trans-unit.source: A serializable mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL JAVA_OBJECT value. Assuming the Java object instance implements the Serializable interface, this simply wraps the serialization process.
trans-unit.target: SQL JAVA_OBJECT值在Java编程语言中的可序列化映射。假设Java对象实例实现了Serializable接口,这就简单地封装了序列化过程。

trans-unit.source: A serializable mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL structured type. Each attribute that is not already serializable is mapped to a serializable form, and if an attribute is itself a structured type, each of its attributes that is not already serializable is mapped to a serializable form.
trans-unit.target: 在Java编程语言中,一个SQL结构化类型的可序列化映射。每一个尚未序列化的属性都被映射到一个可序列化的形式,如果一个属性本身是一个结构化类型,那么它的每一个尚未序列化的属性都被映射到一个可序列化的形式。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL BLOB value.
trans-unit.target: Java BLOB 值的Java编程语言中的序列化映射。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL CLOB value.
trans-unit.target: SQL CLOB 值的Java编程语言中的序列化映射。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL DATALINK value.
trans-unit.target: Java编程语言中SQL DATALINK 值的序列化映射。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL DATALINK value. A DATALINK value references a file outside of the underlying data source that the data source manages.
trans-unit.target: Java编程语言中SQL DATALINK 值的序列化映射。甲 DATALINK 值引用的数据源管理底层数据源的一个文件之外。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL structured type.
trans-unit.target: 在Java编程语言中,一个SQL结构类型的序列化映射。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL structured type. Each attribute that is not already serialized is mapped to a serialized form, and if an attribute is itself a structured type, each of its attributes that is not already serialized is mapped to a serialized form.
trans-unit.target: 在Java编程语言中,SQL结构化类型的序列化映射。每一个尚未序列化的属性都被映射到一个序列化的形式,如果一个属性本身就是一个结构化类型,那么它的每一个尚未序列化的属性都被映射到一个序列化的形式。

trans-unit.source: A serialized mapping of a Ref object, which is the mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL REF value.
trans-unit.target: Ref 对象的序列化映射，这是Java编程语言中SQL REF 值的映射。

trans-unit.source: A serialized version of an Array object, which is the mapping in the Java programming language of an SQL ARRAY value.
trans-unit.target: Array 对象的序列化版本，它是SQL ARRAY 值在Java编程语言中的映射。

trans-unit.source: A server socket associated with this channel
trans-unit.target: 与该通道相关的服务器插座

trans-unit.source: A server socket will have a channel if, and only if, the channel itself was created via the ServerSocketChannel.open method.
trans-unit.target: 仅当通过 ServerSocketChannel.open 方法创建通道本身时，服务器套接字才会具有通道。

trans-unit.source: A server socket will have a channel if, and only if, the channel itself was created via the ServerSocketChannel.open method.
trans-unit.target: 仅当通过 ServerSocketChannel.open 方法创建通道本身时，服务器套接字才会具有通道。

trans-unit.source: A server such an LDAP server gets an instance of this class in order to perform authentication defined by a specific SASL mechanism. Invoking methods on the SaslServer instance generates challenges according to the SASL mechanism implemented by the SaslServer. As the authentication proceeds, the instance encapsulates the state of a SASL server's authentication exchange.
trans-unit.target: 诸如LDAP服务器之类的服务器获取此类的实例，以执行由特定SASL机制定义的身份验证。根据 SaslServer 实现的SASL机制，在 SaslServer 实例上调用方法会产生挑战。随着身份验证的进行，实例将封装SASL服务器的身份验证交换的状态。

trans-unit.source: A server-socket channel is created by invoking the open method of this class. It is not possible to create a channel for an arbitrary, pre-existing ServerSocket. A newly-created server-socket channel is open but not yet bound. An attempt to invoke the accept method of an unbound server-socket channel will cause a NotYetBoundException to be thrown. A server-socket channel can be bound by invoking one of the bind methods defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此类的 open 方法来创建服务器套接字通道。无法为任意的，预先存在的 ServerSocket 创建通道。新创建的服务器套接字通道已打开，但尚未绑定。尝试调用未绑定的服务器套接字通道的 accept 方法将导致引发 NotYetBoundException 。可以通过调用此类定义的 bind 方法之一来绑定服务器套接字通道。

trans-unit.source: A server-socket channel is created by invoking the open method of this class. It is not possible to create a channel for an arbitrary, pre-existing ServerSocket. A newly-created server-socket channel is open but not yet bound. An attempt to invoke the accept method of an unbound server-socket channel will cause a NotYetBoundException to be thrown. A server-socket channel can be bound by invoking one of the bind methods defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此类的 open 方法来创建服务器套接字通道。无法为任意现有的 ServerSocket 创建通道。新创建的服务器套接字通道已打开，但尚未绑定。尝试调用未绑定的服务器套接字通道的 accept 方法将导致引发 NotYetBoundException 。可以通过调用此类定义的 bind 方法之一来绑定服务器套接字通道。

trans-unit.source: A service for a resource bundle of a given baseName must have a fully-qualified class name of the form:
trans-unit.target: 给定 baseName 的资源包的服务必须具有以下形式的标准类名：

trans-unit.source: A service is a single type, usually an interface or abstract class. A concrete class can be used, but this is not recommended. The type may have any accessibility. The methods of a service are highly domain-specific, so this API specification cannot give concrete advice about their form or function. However, there are two general guidelines:
trans-unit.target: 服务是一个单一类型,通常是一个接口或抽象类。可以使用一个具体的类,但不建议这样做。该类型可以具有任何可访问性。服务的方法是高度特定于领域的,所以本 API 规范不能给出关于它们的形式或功能的具体建议。但是,有两个一般准则。

trans-unit.source: A service loader can be used to locate and instantiate providers of the service by means of the iterator method. ServiceLoader also defines the stream method to obtain a stream of providers that can be inspected and filtered without instantiating them.
trans-unit.target: 服务加载器可用于通过 iterator 方法定位和实例化服务的提供者。 ServiceLoader 还定义了 stream 方法，以获取无需进行实例化即可检查和过滤的提供程序流。

trans-unit.source: A service loader will instantiate StandardCodecs via its constructor, and will instantiate ExtendedCodecsFactory by invoking its provider method. The requirement that the provider constructor or provider method is public helps to document the intent that the class (that is, the service provider) will be instantiated by an entity (that is, a service loader) which is outside the class's package.
trans-unit.target: 服务加载器将通过其构造函数实例化 StandardCodecs ，并通过调用其 provider 方法来实例化 ExtendedCodecsFactory 。提供者构造函数或提供者方法是公共的要求有助于记录这样的意图：该类（即服务提供者）将由该类包之外的实体（即服务加载器）实例化。

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the nesting BeanContext has been revoked.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套BeanContext提供的服务已被撤销。

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the nesting BeanContext has been revoked. Subclasses may override this method in order to implement their own behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套BeanContext提供的服务已被撤销。子类可以重写这个方法来实现自己的行为。

trans-unit.source: A service provider and its supporting code may be developed in a module, which is then deployed on the application module path or in a modular image. Alternatively, a service provider and its supporting code may be packaged as a JAR file and deployed on the application class path. The advantage of developing a service provider in a module is that the provider can be fully encapsulated to hide all details of its implementation.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者及其支持代码可以在模块中开发,然后部署在应用模块路径上或模块映像中。另外,服务提供者及其支持代码可以打包为JAR文件,并部署在应用类路径上。在模块中开发服务提供者的优点是,服务提供者可以被完全封装以隐藏其实现的所有细节。

trans-unit.source: A service provider cannot be loaded;
trans-unit.target: 服务商无法加载。

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation SHOULD use underlying JCA engine classes, such as Signature and MessageDigest to perform cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者实现应该使用底层的JCA引擎类，例如 Signature 和 MessageDigest 来执行加密操作。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is a concrete implementation of the abstract XMLSignatureFactory and KeyInfoFactory classes and is responsible for creating objects and algorithms that parse, generate and validate XML Signatures and KeyInfo structures. A concrete implementation of XMLSignatureFactory MUST provide support for each of the REQUIRED algorithms as specified by the W3C recommendation for XML Signatures. It MAY support other algorithms as defined by the W3C recommendation or other specifications.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者是抽象 XMLSignatureFactory 和 KeyInfoFactory 类的具体实现，并负责创建用于解析，生成和验证XML签名和KeyInfo结构的对象和算法。 XMLSignatureFactory 的具体实现必须为W3C针对XML签名的建议所规定的每种必需算法提供支持。它可以支持W3C建议书或其他规范定义的其他算法。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is a single type, usually a concrete class. An interface or abstract class is permitted because it may declare a static provider method, discussed later. The type must be public and must not be an inner class.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者是一个单一类型,通常是一个具体的类。允许使用接口或抽象类,因为它可以声明一个静态提供者方法,后面会讨论。该类型必须是公共的,而且不能是内部类。

trans-unit.source: A service provider is not assignable to the service's interface or class, or does not define a provider constructor, or cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者不能分配给服务的接口或类,或者没有定义提供者构造函数,或者不能实例化。

trans-unit.source: A service provider provides a subclass of ReferralException by providing implementations for getReferralInfo() and getReferralContext() (and appropriate constructors and/or corresponding "set" methods).
trans-unit.target: 服务提供者通过提供 getReferralInfo() 和 getReferralContext() 的实现（以及适当的构造函数和/或相应的“ set”方法）来提供 ReferralException 的子类。

trans-unit.source: A service provider supports connection and context request controls in the following ways. Context request controls must be associated on a per context instance basis while connection request controls must be associated on a per connection instance basis. The service provider must look for the connection request controls in the environment property "java.naming.ldap.control.connect" and pass this environment property on to context instances that it creates.
trans-unit.target: 服务提供商以下列方式支持连接和上下文请求控制。上下文请求控件必须基于每个上下文实例进行关联,而连接请求控件必须基于每个连接实例进行关联。服务提供者必须在环境属性 "java.naming.ldap.control.connect "中寻找连接请求控件,并将这个环境属性传递给它创建的上下文实例。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is deployed as an automatic module on the application module path must have a provider constructor. There is no support for a provider method in this case.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序模块路径上作为自动模块部署的服务提供程序必须具有提供程序构造函数。在这种情况下，不支持提供者方法。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is developed in a module has no control over when it is instantiated, since that occurs at the behest of the application, but it does have control over how it is instantiated:
trans-unit.target: 在模块中开发的服务提供者无法控制它何时被实例化,因为那是在应用程序的要求下发生的,但它可以控制它如何被实例化。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is developed in a module must be specified in a
trans-unit.target: 在一个模块中开发的服务提供者必须在 "服务提供者 "中指定。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is mentioned in a provider-configuration file may be located in the same JAR file as the provider-configuration file or in a different JAR file. The service provider must be visible from the class loader that is initially queried to locate the provider-configuration file; this is not necessarily the class loader which ultimately locates the provider-configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者配置文件中提到的服务提供者可能位于与提供者配置文件相同的 JAR 文件中,也可能位于不同的 JAR 文件中。服务提供者必须在最初被查询以定位提供者配置文件的类加载器中可见;这不一定是最终定位提供者配置文件的类加载器。

trans-unit.source: A service provider that is packaged as a JAR file for the class path is identified by placing a
trans-unit.target: 通过在类路径的JAR文件中放置一个符号来识别被打包成JAR文件的服务提供商。

trans-unit.source: A service should declare as many methods as needed to allow service providers to communicate their domain-specific properties and other quality-of-implementation factors. An application which obtains a service loader for the service may then invoke these methods on each instance of a service provider, in order to choose the best provider for the application.
trans-unit.target: 一个服务应该声明尽可能多的方法,以允许服务提供者传达它们的特定领域属性和其他实施质量因素。获得服务加载器的应用程序可以在服务提供者的每个实例上调用这些方法,以便为应用程序选择最佳提供者。

trans-unit.source: A service should express whether its service providers are intended to be direct implementations of the service or to be an indirection mechanism such as a "proxy" or a "factory". Service providers tend to be indirection mechanisms when domain-specific objects are relatively expensive to instantiate; in this case, the service should be designed so that service providers are abstractions which create the "real" implementation on demand. For example, the CodecFactory service expresses through its name that its service providers are factories for codecs, rather than codecs themselves, because it may be expensive or complicated to produce certain codecs.
trans-unit.target: 服务应表明其服务提供者是要直接实现服务还是要成为间接机制，例如“代理”或“工厂”。当特定于域的对象实例化相对昂贵时，服务提供者往往是间接机制。在这种情况下，应该对服务进行设计，以使服务提供者是可以按需创建“实际”实现的抽象。例如， CodecFactory 服务通过其名称表示其服务提供者是编解码器的工厂，而不是编解码器本身，因为生成某些编解码器可能很昂贵或很复杂。

trans-unit.source: A service that a module provides one or more implementations of.
trans-unit.target: 一个模块提供的一个或多个实现的服务。

trans-unit.source: A service that decouples the production of new asynchronous tasks from the consumption of the results of completed tasks.
trans-unit.target: 一个将新的异步任务的产生与已完成任务的结果的消耗脱钩的服务。

trans-unit.source: A service that decouples the production of new asynchronous tasks from the consumption of the results of completed tasks. Producers submit tasks for execution. Consumers take completed tasks and process their results in the order they complete. A CompletionService can for example be used to manage asynchronous I/O, in which tasks that perform reads are submitted in one part of a program or system, and then acted upon in a different part of the program when the reads complete, possibly in a different order than they were requested.
trans-unit.target: 一种服务，该服务将新异步任务的产生与完成任务的结果的消耗分开。生产者 submit 任务以执行。消费者 take 完成的任务和处理它们的顺序结果，他们完成了。甲 CompletionService 可以例如用于管理异步I / O，其中执行读取的程序的不同部分地基于在一个程序或系统的一个组成部分被提交，然后作用在所述读取完整，可能当任务与要求的顺序不同。

trans-unit.source: A session can be retrieved based on its session id, and all session id's in a SSLSessionContext can be listed.
trans-unit.target: 可以基于会话ID检索会话，并且可以列出 SSLSessionContext 中的所有会话ID 。

trans-unit.target: 一组包含加载的m-let文本文件中每个MLET标签的一个条目。每个条目都指定了所创建的MBean的ObjectInstance,或者是一个可抛出的对象(即错误或异常),如果MBean不能被创建。

trans-unit.source: A similar, but simpler, situation occurs for the Japanese calendar system. The locale "jp_JP_JP" has previously been used to access the calendar. However, unlike the Thai locale, "ja_JP_JP" is automatically converted by Locale to the modern and recommended form of "ja-JP-u-ca-japanese". Thus, there is no difference in behavior between this method and Calendar#getInstance(Locale).
trans-unit.target: 日本日历系统也会发生类似但更简单的情况。语言环境“ jp_JP_JP”以前已用于访问日历。但是，与泰国语言环境不同，“ ja_JP_JP”会由 Locale 自动转换为现代的推荐形式“ ja-JP-u-ca-japanese”。因此，此方法与 Calendar#getInstance(Locale) 之间的行为没有区别。

trans-unit.source: A simple adjuster might simply set the one of the fields, such as the year field. A more complex adjuster might set the date to the last day of the month.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的调整器可以简单地设置其中的一个字段,如年份字段。一个更复杂的调整器可能会将日期设置为该月的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: A simple adjuster might simply set the one of the fields, such as the year field. A more complex adjuster might set the date to the last day of the month. A selection of common adjustments is provided in TemporalAdjusters. These include finding the "last day of the month" and "next Wednesday". Key date-time classes also implement the TemporalAdjuster interface, such as Month and MonthDay. The adjuster is responsible for handling special cases, such as the varying lengths of month and leap years.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的调节器可以简单地设置一个字段，例如Year字段。更复杂的调节器可能会将日期设置为该月的最后一天。在 TemporalAdjusters 中提供了一些常用调整的选择。其中包括找到“每月的最后一天”和“下一个星期三”。关键的日期时间类也实现了 TemporalAdjuster 接口，例如 Month 和 MonthDay 。调节器负责处理特殊情况，例如不同长度的月份和leap年。

trans-unit.source: A simple adjuster might simply set the one of the fields, such as the year field. A more complex adjuster might set the year-month to the next month that Halley's comet will pass the Earth.
trans-unit.target: 一个简单的调整器可以简单地设置其中的一个字段,例如年字段。一个更复杂的调整器可以将年月设置为哈雷彗星将经过地球的下一个月。

trans-unit.source: A simplified example of how this method might be used in a listener:
trans-unit.target: 一个简化的例子,说明如何在监听器中使用这种方法。

trans-unit.source: A single int pixel representation is valid for all objects of this class since it is always possible to represent pixel values used with this class in a single int. Therefore, methods that use this representation do not throw an IllegalArgumentException due to an invalid pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 单个 int 像素表示形式对此类的所有对象均有效，因为始终可以在单个 int 中表示与该类一起使用的像素值。因此，由于无效的像素值，使用此表示形式的方法不会引发 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: A single SubmissionPublisher may be shared among multiple sources. Actions in a source thread prior to publishing an item or issuing a signal happen-before actions subsequent to the corresponding access by each subscriber. But reported estimates of lag and demand are designed for use in monitoring, not for synchronization control, and may reflect stale or inaccurate views of progress.
trans-unit.target: 单个SubmissionPublisher可以在多个源之间共享。在发布项目或发出信号之前，源线程中的动作发生在每个订户进行相应访问之后的动作之前。但是，报告的滞后和需求估算仅用于监视，而不用于同步控制，并且可能反映了过时的陈旧或不正确的观点。

trans-unit.source: A single character access key to give access to the form control.
trans-unit.target: 单一字符的访问键,以赋予表单控制的访问权。

trans-unit.source: A single character access key to give access to the form control. See the accesskey attribute definition in HTML 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个单字符的访问键,用于访问表单控件。参见HTML 4.0中的accessskey属性定义。

trans-unit.source: A single input source for an XML entity.
trans-unit.target: 一个XML实体的单一输入源。

trans-unit.source: A single int pixel representation is valid for all objects of this class, since it is always possible to represent pixel values used with this class in a single int. Therefore, methods which use this representation will not throw an IllegalArgumentException due to an invalid pixel value.
trans-unit.target: 单个int像素表示形式对此类的所有对象均有效，因为始终可以在单个int中表示与该类一起使用的像素值。因此，由于无效的像素值，使用此表示形式的方法将不会引发 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: A single line input field that lets the user select a number or an object value from an ordered sequence.
trans-unit.target: 一个单行输入字段,让用户从一个有序的序列中选择一个数字或一个对象值。

trans-unit.source: A single line input field that lets the user select a number or an object value from an ordered sequence. Spinners typically provide a pair of tiny arrow buttons for stepping through the elements of the sequence. The keyboard up/down arrow keys also cycle through the elements. The user may also be allowed to type a (legal) value directly into the spinner. Although combo boxes provide similar functionality, spinners are sometimes preferred because they don't require a drop down list that can obscure important data.
trans-unit.target: 一个单行输入字段,让用户从一个有序的序列中选择一个数字或对象值。旋转器通常提供一对微小的箭头按钮,用于跳过序列的元素。键盘上的上/下方向键也可以在元素中循环。用户也可以直接在旋转器中输入一个(合法的)值。虽然组合框提供了类似的功能,但旋转器有时更受欢迎,因为它们不需要下拉列表,而下拉列表会掩盖重要的数据。

trans-unit.source: A single strikethrough.
trans-unit.target: 一击即中。

trans-unit.source: A single switch point may be used to control any number of method handles. (Indirectly, therefore, it can control any number of call sites.) This is done by using the single switch point as a factory for combining any number of guarded method handle pairs into guarded delegators.
trans-unit.target: 单个开关点可以用来控制任意数量的方法句柄。(因此,它可以间接地控制任意数量的调用站点。)这是通过使用单个开关点作为工厂,将任意数量的受保护的方法句柄对组合成受保护的委托人来实现的。(因此,它可以间接地控制任何数量的调用站点。)这是通过使用单个开关点作为一个工厂,将任意数量的受保护的方法句柄对组合成受保护的委托人来实现的。

trans-unit.source: A single-bit mask representing module access (default access), which may contribute to the result of lookupModes.
trans-unit.target: 代表 module 访问权限（默认访问权限）的一位掩码，可能会导致 lookupModes 的结果。

trans-unit.source: A single-bit mask representing module access (default access), which may contribute to the result of lookupModes. The value is 0x10, which does not correspond meaningfully to any particular modifier bit. In conjunction with the PUBLIC modifier bit, a Lookup with this lookup mode can access all public types in the module of the lookup class and public types in packages exported by other modules to the module of the lookup class.
trans-unit.target: 代表 module 访问权限（默认访问权限）的一位掩码，可能会导致 lookupModes 的结果。值为 0x10 ，它与任何特定的修饰符位都没有意义。在用连词 PUBLIC 改性剂位，一个 Lookup 与该查找模式可以访问所有公共类型的查找类和公共类型的模块在其它模块导出到查找类的模块包。

trans-unit.source: A single-bit mask representing unconditional access which may contribute to the result of lookupModes.
trans-unit.target: 一位代表 unconditional 访问的掩码，可能会导致 lookupModes 的结果。

trans-unit.source: A single-bit mask representing unconditional access which may contribute to the result of lookupModes. The value is 0x20, which does not correspond meaningfully to any particular modifier bit. A Lookup with this lookup mode assumes readability. In conjunction with the PUBLIC modifier bit, a Lookup with this lookup mode can access all public members of public types of all modules where the type is in a package that is exported unconditionally.
trans-unit.target: 一位代表 unconditional 访问的掩码，可能会导致 lookupModes 的结果。值为 0x20 ，与任何特定的修饰符位都没有意义。一个 Lookup 与此查找模式取得的可读性。在用连词 PUBLIC 改性剂位，一个 Lookup 与该查找模式可以访问公共类型的所有模块，其中类型是在被包装的所有公共成员 exported unconditionally 。

trans-unit.source: A single-bit mask representing unconditional access which may contribute to the result of lookupModes. The value is 0x20, which does not correspond meaningfully to any particular modifier bit. A Lookup with this lookup mode assumes readability. This lookup mode can access all public members of public types of all modules when the type is in a package that is exported unconditionally.
trans-unit.target: 一位代表 unconditional 访问的掩码，可能会导致 lookupModes 的结果。值为 0x20 ，与任何特定的修饰符位都没有意义。一个 Lookup 与此查找模式取得的可读性。当类型位于 exported unconditionally 的包中时，此查找模式可以访问所有模块的公共类型的所有公共成员。

trans-unit.source: A single-method interface is an interface which declares a uniquely named method. When determining the uniquely named method of a single-method interface, the public Object methods (toString, equals, hashCode) are disregarded as are any default (non-abstract) methods. For example, Comparator is a single-method interface, even though it re-declares the Object.equals method and also declares default methods, such as Comparator.reverse.
trans-unit.target: 单方法接口是声明唯一命名方法的接口。在确定单方法接口的唯一命名方法时，将忽略公共 Object 方法（ toString ， equals ， hashCode ），以及任何默认（非抽象）方法。例如， Comparator 是一个单方法接口，即使它重新声明了 Object.equals 方法并且还声明了默认方法，例如 Comparator.reverse 。

trans-unit.source: A single-method interface is an interface which declares a uniquely named method. trans-unit.target: 单方法接口是声明唯一命名方法的接口。确定单方法接口的唯一命名方法时，将忽略公共 Object 方法（ toString ， equals ， hashCode ）。例如， Comparator 是一个单方法接口，即使它重新声明了 Object.equals 方法。
